direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve retrieving results from a map structure, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods interact with the hResults map to retrieve different types of information (keys vs. values).
Both methods check the state of the hResults map, though for different purposes (emptiness vs. value retrieval).
Both methods manipulate the hResults map, though merge adds entries from another ValidatorResults instance.
Both methods modify the hResults map, though clear removes all entries while getResultValueMap retrieves values.
The add method populates the hResults map, which is directly used by getResultValueMap to retrieve values.
Similar to the previous add method, this one also populates the hResults map with values that getResultValueMap retrieves.
